document.full_text: for fumihiro shimizu and his family-owned auto parts plant in this company town, being a second-tier supplier for japan's top car makers has never been easy.
document.title: far from quake, toyota city's suppliers on life support
lines_and_colors: for fumihiro shimizu and his family-owned auto parts plant in this company town, being a second-tier supplier for japan's top car makers has never been easy.
